title: [K-12] Transformative Pedagogy-Based Project Design for a Sustainable Future

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of basic social studies courses and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Builds collaborative learning environments using digital devices, strengthening sustainability competencies through real-world problem-solving

learning_goals: Learners can analyze community issues from a sustainability perspective and propose solutions
Learners can establish and execute project plans considering environmental, economic, and social factors
Learners can visually represent and share project results using digital tools

resources: Digital collaboration tools (Padlet, Google Workspace, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
